name: Bloodstained Chivalry
flower_description: A dried flower stained black with blood and now as hard as steel. Probably some sort of a memento for its former master.
feather_description: A raven feather pinned to a knight's cape. Countless bloodstains have dyed it pitch black.
sand_description: A timepiece once used by a knight. The liquid inside has dried up, rendering it useless.
goblet_description: The dark metallic vessel owned by the Bloodstained Knight. Its exterior has been stained as black as the night by smoke and coagulated blood.
circlet_description: The iron mask the knight used to conceal their identity. Many have speculated about the face behind the mask.
four_pc_bonus: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.
